title: Help...
body: I got disconnected from a game and I tried to reconnect but It doesn't send me back in game, it leave me in the lobby without nothing even loading.

replies.body: It looks like we've been having a few issues with some players not being able to reach our login servers since about 9PM PST last night. I've gotten word that the main issue seems to be a cut fiber line, and techs are already on the job getting that fixed up. Be sure to check the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates!
